attributes.action: Parking around Bispham by DWP staff
attributes.additional_details:
Those of us that live near to the DWP Offices around Bispham appreciate the problems with leaving the site at the end of their shifts...

However, those of use who live near the site, struggle to move up and down our roads, or to park on our drives.

Please can you ensure that you make space for your workers to park on site, and not anywhere that they please, and let's be fair here, they do not park well, when not parking on site.

There is ample parking one site and the fact that it takes a "while to leave" is something that can be sorted with the council.

I see no reason (or rather, we the undersigned) see no reason that we should have out complete street blocked, preventing ambulances, fire and Police services gaining appropriate access.

Not to mention those of us who work for the emergency services leaving our homes...

Please sign this and help your local community.

Many thanks,

Bispham Residents.
